mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO sd_ad_rp ( `date`, currency, campaign_name, portfolio_name, cost_type, ad_group_name, bid_optimization, advertised_sku, advertised_asin, impressions, viewable_impressions, clicks, ctr, fourteen_day_detail_page_views, spend, cpc, vcpm, acos, roas, fourteen_day_total_orders, fourteen_day_total_units, fourteen_day_total_sales, fourteen_day_new_to_brand_orders, fourteen_day_new_to_brand_sales, fourteen_day_new_to_brand_units, total_advertising_cost_of_sales_acos_click, total_return_on_advertising_spend_roas_click, fourteen_day_total_orders_click, fourteen_day_total_units_click, fourteen_day_total_sales_click, fourteen_day_new_to_brand_orders_click, fourteen_day_new_to_brand_sales_click, fourteen_day_new_to_brand_units_click ) VALUES
( #{item.date}, #{item.currency}, #{item.campaignName}, #{item.portfolioName}, #{item.costType}, #{item.adGroupName}, #{item.bidOptimization}, #{item.advertisedSku}, #{item.advertisedAsin}, #{item.impressions}, #{item.viewableImpressions}, #{item.clicks}, #{item.ctr}, #{item.fourteenDayDetailPageViews}, #{item.spend}, #{item.cpc}, #{item.vcpm}, #{item.acos}, #{item.roas}, #{item.fourteenDayTotalOrders}, #{item.fourteenDayTotalUnits}, #{item.fourteenDayTotalSales}, #{item.fourteenDayNewToBrandOrders}, #{item.fourteenDayNewToBrandSales}, #{item.fourteenDayNewToBrandUnits}, #{item.totalAdvertisingCostOfSalesAcosClick}, #{item.totalReturnOnAdvertisingSpendRoasClick}, #{item.fourteenDayTotalOrdersClick}, #{item.fourteenDayTotalUnitsClick}, #{item.fourteenDayTotalSalesClick}, #{item.fourteenDayNewToBrandOrdersClick}, #{item.fourteenDayNewToBrandSalesClick}, #{item.fourteenDayNewToBrandUnitsClick} )

INSERT INTO sd_ad_rp ( `date`, currency, campaign_name, portfolio_name, cost_type, ad_group_name, bid_optimization, advertised_sku, advertised_asin, impressions, viewable_impressions, clicks, ctr, fourteen_day_detail_page_views, spend, cpc, vcpm, acos, roas, fourteen_day_total_orders, fourteen_day_total_units, fourteen_day_total_sales, fourteen_day_new_to_brand_orders, fourteen_day_new_to_brand_sales, fourteen_day_new_to_brand_units, total_advertising_cost_of_sales_acos_click, total_return_on_advertising_spend_roas_click, fourteen_day_total_orders_click, fourteen_day_total_units_click, fourteen_day_total_sales_click, fourteen_day_new_to_brand_orders_click, fourteen_day_new_to_brand_sales_click, fourteen_day_new_to_brand_units_click ) VALUES
( #{item.date}, #{item.currency}, #{item.campaignName}, #{item.portfolioName}, #{item.costType}, #{item.adGroupName}, #{item.bidOptimization}, #{item.advertisedSku}, #{item.advertisedAsin}, #{item.impressions}, #{item.viewableImpressions}, #{item.clicks}, #{item.ctr}, #{item.fourteenDayDetailPageViews}, #{item.spend}, #{item.cpc}, #{item.vcpm}, #{item.acos}, #{item.roas}, #{item.fourteenDayTotalOrders}, #{item.fourteenDayTotalUnits}, #{item.fourteenDayTotalSales}, #{item.fourteenDayNewToBrandOrders}, #{item.fourteenDayNewToBrandSales}, #{item.fourteenDayNewToBrandUnits}, #{item.totalAdvertisingCostOfSalesAcosClick}, #{item.totalReturnOnAdvertisingSpendRoasClick}, #{item.fourteenDayTotalOrdersClick}, #{item.fourteenDayTotalUnitsClick}, #{item.fourteenDayTotalSalesClick}, #{item.fourteenDayNewToBrandOrdersClick}, #{item.fourteenDayNewToBrandSalesClick}, #{item.fourteenDayNewToBrandUnitsClick} )
